author: seibert
msg: Standardize on the property variables, such as "axis.home" instead of "basedir"

author: seibert
msg: This is to repair a subtle problem in the functional test execution.
There wasn't an explicit mkdir for the test-reports, but I added a super clean
that removed it last week.  There were a couple of places where it was recreated,
and in my new test structure is is checked and created if not there.
So I added in a new mkdir for the test-reports tree at the junit execution target
to ensure that this path will exist.

author: stevel
